title: 81/479/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 June 1981 approving the programme on the development of sheep farming in Greenland, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1821/80 (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 June 1981 approving the programme on the development of sheep farming in Greenland, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1821/80 (Only the Danish text is authentic) (81/479/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme on the development of sheep farming in Greenland, forwarded by the Danish Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1821/80 on 19 March 1981, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 June 1981.
For the Commission
The President
Gaston THORN
(1) OJ No L 180, 14.7.1980, p. 9.
